mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.code as code, c.img_url as imgUrl, c.title as title, c.user_open_id as userOpenId, c.desc as `desc`, c.create_time as createTime, c.update_time as updateTime FROM image_info c order by c.create_time desc

select c.id as id, c.code as code, c.img_url as imgUrl, c.banner_code as bannerCode, c.user_open_id as userOpenId, c.desc as `desc`, c.create_time as createTime, c.update_time as updateTime FROM image_detail_info c where c.banner_code=#{id} order by c.create_time desc

SELECT a.bless_user as blessUser, -- 点赞人openid a.create_time as createTime, -- 点赞时间 b.avatar_url as avatarUrl, -- 点赞人头像地址 b.nick_name as nickName, -- 点赞人昵称 b.province as province, -- 点赞人省份 b.city as city -- 点赞人城市 FROM `bless_info` a LEFT JOIN user_info b on a.bless_user = b.open_id order by a.create_time desc

SELECT a.comment_user as userOpenId, a.`comment` as `comment`, a.create_time as createTime, b.nick_name as nickName, b.province as province, b.city as city, b.avatar_url as avatarUrl FROM `comment_info` a LEFT JOIN user_info b on b.open_id = a.comment_user ORDER BY a.create_time desc
SELECT count(id) from bless_info where bless_user = #{openId}

SELECT name_title as nameTitle, solar_calendar as solarCalendar, lunar_calendar as lunarCalendar, address as address, longitude as longitude, latitude as latitude, bg_img_url as bgImgUrl from map_info where del = 0
mapper.insert: insert into comment_info( comment_user, comment, create_time )values ( #{userOpenId}, #{comment}, now() )
insert into bless_info( bless_user, create_time )values ( #{openId}, now() )
insert into image_info( code, img_url, title, user_open_id, create_time, update_time )values ( #{code}, #{imgUrl}, #{title}, #{userOpenId}, now(), now() )
insert into image_detail_info( code, img_url, user_open_id, banner_code, create_time, update_time )values ( #{code}, #{imgUrl}, #{userOpenId}, #{bannerCode}, now(), now() )
